thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great find
thread.title_full: A great find - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jayne B
title: A great find
text:
I stayed here with 5 friends for 5 nights and we had a brilliant stay. Check in was a little slow as only 2 out of 3 rooms were ready but once we were all settled I couldn't fault the hotel. The rooms were cosy, clean and comfortable, complimentary tea and coffees in the room and reception as well as breakfast too. the staff were always friendly and helpful and we were allowed to stay an extra hour in our rooms after check in. All in all we had a great stay and I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the big apple
Room Tip: rooms facing the street have floor to ceiling windows but rooms at the back don't get any street... See more room tips
